GET /api.description: Returns a JSON representation of all available API endpoints.

GET /api/topics.description: Returns an array of all available topics.

GET /api/articles/:article_id.description: Returns an article object matching the specified `article_id` (from the parametric endpoint).

article.title: Sony Vaio; or, The Laptop
article.author: icellusedkars
article.body: Call me Mitchell. Some years ago..

GET /api/articles.description: Returns an array of all articles, along with a `total_count` for the number of articles. Results are sorted by date in descending order and limited to 10 by default. Additional queries can be used to filter or modify the response.

GET /api/articles/:article_id/comments.description: Returns an array of comments for the specified `article_id` (from the parametric endpoint), with the most recent comments listed first.

POST /api/articles/:article_id/comments.description: Returns an object containing the comment inserted into the comments table, associated with the specified `article_id` (from the parametric endpoint). Required fields in the request body: `username` and `body`.

PATCH /api/articles/:article_id.description: Returns the updated article object with its `votes` property adjusted, based on the specified `article_id` (from the parametric endpoint). Required field in the request body: `inc_votes`.

article.title: Sony Vaio; or, The Laptop
article.author: icellusedkars
article.body: Call me Mitchell. Some years ago..

DELETE /api/comments/:comment_id.description: Deletes the comment associated with the specified `comment_id` (from the parametric endpoint) from the comments table. No response body is returned.

GET /api/users.description: Returns an array of all users.

GET /api/users/:username.description: Returns a user object that matches the specified `username` (from the parametric endpoint).

PATCH /api/comments/:comment_id.description: Returns an object containing the updated comment matching the specified `comment_id` (from the parametric endpoint), with its `votes` property adjusted. Required field in the request body: `inc_votes`.

POST /api/articles.description: Returns an object containing the article inserted into the articles table. Required fields in the request body: `title`, `topic`, `author`, and `body`. Optional field for request body: `article_img_url`.

POST /api/topics.description: Returns an object containing the topic inserted into the topics table. Required fields in the request body: `slug` and `description`. Optional field for request body: `img_url`.

topic.description: All about the game of chess

DELETE /api/articles/:article_id.description: Deletes the article associated with the specified `article_id` (from the parametric endpoint) from the articles table. No response body is returned.
